TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RuntimeEnvironment extends System.Object

summary.span: Fournit une collection de méthodes qui retournent des informations sur l’environnement du Common Language Runtime.

span.span: Provides a collection of methods that return information about the common language runtime environment.

remarks.format: ## Examples Cet exemple montre comment appeler la plupart des méthodes définies par le classe.This example shows how to call many of the methods defined by the class. The identifier for the desired interface.

summary.span: Retourne l’interface spécifiée pour la classe spécifiée.

span.span: Returns the specified interface on the specified class.

returns.span: Pointeur non managé vers l’interface demandée.

span.span: An unmanaged pointer to the requested interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette méthode est semblable à l’appel de la méthode sur l’interface qui représente cette exécution.This method is similar to calling the method on the interface that represents this runtime. Le tableau suivant affiche les combinaisons prises en charge pour `clsid` et `riid`.The following table shows the supported combinations for `clsid` and `riid`. |`clsid`|`riid`| |-------------|------------| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenser|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntimeCLSID_CorMetaDataDispenserRuntime|IID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserExIID_IMetaDataDispenser, IID_IMetaDataDispenserEx| |CLSID_CorRuntimeHostCLSID_CorRuntimeHost|IID_CorRuntimeHostIID_CorRuntimeHost| |CLSID_CLRRuntimeHostCLSID_CLRRuntimeHost|IID_CLRRuntimeHost (non valide pour le common language runtime qui est fourni par le [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3IID_CLRRuntimeHost (not valid for the common language runtime that is provided by the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]), IID_CLRRuntimeHost3| |CLSID_TypeNameFactoryCLSID_TypeNameFactory|IID_TypeNameFactoryIID_TypeNameFactory| |CLSID_CLRStrongNameCLSID_CLRStrongName|IID_CLRStrongNameIID_CLRStrongName| est similaire à la (méthode). is similar to the method.

span.span: [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=144867) failure.

permission.span: requiert une confiance totale pour l’appelant immédiat.

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: Ce membre ne peut pas être utilisé par le code de confiance partielle ou transparent.

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

summary.span: Obtient le numéro de version du Common Language Runtime qui exécute le processus actif.

span.span: A string containing the version number of the common language runtime.
